Html:
Hi radioman. I'd like to decrease the TextPadding on the Makrer Tooltip (i.e. I want less space between the text and the balloon borders). I see in the GMapTooltip class there is a TextPadding line which reads as follows:

    public Size TextPadding = new Size(3, 3);

I have decreased it to 

    public Size TextPadding = new Size(1, 1);

and recompiled, but it doesnt seem to be making a difference when I change it. Am I doing something wrong?

Kind Regards
Fabricio Rodriguez
Pretoria, South Africa
default tooltip is GMapRoundedToolTip, so you made changes in the wrong place
